name: Abernathium
description:
Audio warning: midi music does play and may be loud depending on your speaker settings.

Can you use Abernathium to gain enough speed to run out of (outer) space?

Graphics for the main game didn't get completed in time, nor did some flushing out of scenes.  The game is playable, but a bit off.

The overall idea was the red circle was to be a black hole, and Simple Pat discovered that with the help of Abernathium, he was able to run on the fabric of space, and phase jump to different beams.

The goal was to gain enough speed running on light beams (from the black hole) while collecting the light energy to run "through" the black hole with enough speed to run "out" of space.

By Stephen Riley, Matthew Traylor, and Justin Vidler
